level.text: Each HHA training program shall maintain resources, facilities, and services which are adequate to accommodate the training program. The resources, facilities, and services shall include, but are not limited to:
Adequate temperature controls in each training facility;
Clean and safe conditions of the facility’s premises;
Adequate lighting in each facility; and
Sufficient and adequate equipment for the program’s needs, including audio-visual equipment and equipment needed for simulating client care.
Each classroom, conference room, laboratory, and office shall be adequate to meet the needs of the HHA training program.
Each cooperative agreement between an HHA training program and an agency shall be in writing. The training program shall maintain a copy of the agreement in its records.
